text: The year 2009 is the first year in the history of BAMMA, a mixed martial arts promotion based in the United Kingdom. In 2009 BAMMA held 1 event, BAMMA 1: The Fighting Premiership. ==Events list== {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="font-size:90%;" |- ! scope="col" | # ! scope="col" | Event Title ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Arena ! scope="col" | Location ! scope="col" | Broadcast |- | align=center| 1 | BAMMA 1: The Fighting Premiership | | Room by the River | London, England, United Kingdom | Bravo |} ==BAMMA 1: The Fighting Premiership== BAMMA 1: The Fighting Premiership was an event held on June 27, 2009 at the Room by the River in London, England, United Kingdom. ===Results=== ==References== Category:BAMMA events Category:2009 in mixed martial arts
title: 2009 in BAMMA
